scripts.pub-instruments: npm run patch-instruments && ng build instruments --prod && cd dist/instruments && npm pack && npm publish --access=public && cd ../..
scripts.pub-constants: npm run patch-constants && ng build constants --prod && cd dist/constants && npm pack && npm publish --access=public && cd ../..
scripts.pub-users: npm run patch-users && ng build users --prod && cd dist/users && npm pack && npm publish --access=public && cd ../..
scripts.pub-forms: npm run patch-forms && ng build form-control --prod && cd dist/form-control && npm pack && npm publish --access=public && cd ../..
scripts.patch-instruments: cd projects/instruments && npm version patch && cd ../..
scripts.patch-constants: cd projects/constants && npm version patch && cd ../..
scripts.patch-users: cd projects/users && npm version patch && cd ../..
scripts.patch-forms: cd projects/form-control && npm version patch && cd ../..
scripts.pub-all: npm run pub-forms && npm run pub-constants && npm run pub-instruments && npm run pub-users
scripts.install-all: npm i ; cd projects/form-control && npm i && cd ../constants && npm i && cd ../instruments && npm i && cd ../users && npm i && cd ../..
